short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and control your social media usage. Save your valuable time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snow uses game mechanics to help increase your self-control over social media usage. Social media sites use machine learning to actively increase your usage, targeting your pleasure and reward mechanisms. Snow acts as a psychological counter, helping you to save your valuable time.
